entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:33 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -36.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 2:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -36.5°C

Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -46

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 40 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 40 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 49 this morning and minus 55 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42 with temperature rising to minus 37 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 42 with temperature rising to minus 37 by morning. Wind chill minus 58 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 32.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
